title: Watercooler
description: A desktop application for interacting with the ChatGPT API, written with Rust, Tauri, React, and Mantine.

title: Algorithmic Color Palettes
description: Using clustering algorithms to create color palettes from movie stills.

title: vhttp
description: A simple HTTP testing library for Go.

title: apoor-dot-dev
description: A URL shortener written in Rust and deployed on Fly.io.

title: Predicting Spotify Track Skips
description: Using a dataset of listening sessions to predict whether or not a user would skip a given track.

title: ssh.austinpoor.com
description: A sample TUI SSH server built with Go, Wish, and Lipgloss. Give it a try at ssh.austinpoor.com!

title: RL Chrome Dino-Game Solver
description: Playing the Chrome no-internet-dinosaur game with Selenium, reinforcement learning, and heuristics.

title: Password Generator
description: A PoC of a password generator GUI app built with Rust, Tauri, and Svelte.

title: bcrypt-rsjs
description: A PoC of a bcrypt password-hashing library for Node.js, written in Rust and Neon – designed to replace "bcrypt", which uses C++.

title: Handling ML Predictions in a Flask App
description: Handling long-running processes – like ML model predictions – inside a Flask app using Celery.

title: fun-run
description: A CLI for executing multiple processes in parallel – like docker compose without the containers.

title: Political Text Classification with LSTMs
description: Using Deep Learning and LSTMs to attempt to classify the political leaning of a news article.

title: Grover's Algorithm in Processing
description: A visualization of Grover's Algorithm – a quantum algorithm for searching unstructured data – written in Processing.
